User Guide

Easy steps to get started

Step 1:

Login to your account or create a new one.

(For testing, use the following: username: "mike" and password: "Mike@123")

Step 2:

Create your Word document (.docx) template on your system.

Important: use two curly braces and inside them give the column name present in your list (Excel file): e.g., {{placeholder_name}}

This placeholder will be replaced with data from your Excel file to create personalized documents.

Give a title to the document and upload the template. It should appear in the list of uploaded files.

Step 3:

Upload an Excel file (.xlsx) with columns matching the placeholder names in the template, e.g., {{ name }}, {{ address }}.

Step 4:

Click on the "Upload and Generate" button to generate documents.

The generated documents will be downloaded as a zip file.
